Commentary: pushed through on middle, tapped with the incoming angle to mid-on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: fired into middle and leg, Shahzad shuffles across off and launches a slog-sweep over backward square leg for four
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

Commentary: Shahzad ventures outside leg, throws Mehidy off his line, speared wide down the leg side, past the batsman, past the keeper. Given as wides. Not sure if that was deflected off the pads? Mushfiqur isn't pleased with the decision
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 3 wides

Commentary: swept off the pads again but straight to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: back of a length and skidding into the hips, as Shahzad goes low and misses the sweep now
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: drifting down leg, away from the reach of another sweep, another leg-side wide
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 wide

Commentary: tossed outside off, Shahzad frees his arms again. He drops down to one knee and pings a slog-sweep over midwicket
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

Commentary: Shahzad backs away outside leg, Mehidy follows him, the batsman picks up this length ball angling in and biffs it over long-on for six. Bam! Shahzad welcomes Mehidy with an 18-run over
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, SIX runs

Commentary: good length, drifts in, then breaks away, chopped to the covers
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: back of a length and slides on off, clipped away past the right of mid-on
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: tapped from outside off to the right of mid-on for one
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

Commentary: lovely ball from Islam. Tossed up nicely, drifts in towards off, then grips and turns past the batsman. Drew him forward and the dip creates distance between bat and pitch of ball. Mushfiq breaks the bails but Ghani grounds his back leg in time
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: short, wide, slashed to point
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: short and spins away, Ghani slashes again but still can't beat backward point
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Usman Ghani, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: Ghani swings across the line and misses, the ball misses the offstump
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: wide of the crease, full and slanting into the pads, tickled away to square leg. Ghani hobbles across for the single. The physio is now out to tend to him. He stretches out his left leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, 1 leg bye

Commentary: back of a length and angling in at off, run away to point
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

Commentary: full and nipping down leg, past the flick, past the keeper, five wides
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, 5 wides

Commentary: pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: bouncer angling in at the head, the batsman ducks out of the way of harm
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: nurdled to square leg for one
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and angling in on middle, punched up to mid-on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: backs away and chops to cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: arm ball, picked off the pads to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: Shahzad backs away and hacks a length ball to square leg
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: slider on off, stabbed to mid-off off the back foot
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: Shahzad ventures down the track, Shakib drags his length back and attacks the stumps. Pushed back to the right of the bowler
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: short and angling in on middle, rocks back and swats a pull to the left of deep midwicket. Liton leaps across to his left and palms the ball into play. Excellent effort from Liton
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, 2 runs

Commentary: tossed on leg, defended back
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: floated up on middle, uses his feet and lifts it beautifully over the bowler's head. Clean swing
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, SIX runs
Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run
Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run
Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: back of a length and holds its line on off, Shahzad stays leg-side of the ball and chops to backward point. He chances a single and scampers across. Bangladesh needed a direct hit there
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length and angling into the hips, flicked with the angle to deep square leg for one more
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, beats Shahzad's attempt to cut it away
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Mohammad Shahzad, no run

Commentary: length ball outside off, Shahzad flits around the crease and hacks the ball to long-on off the inside half
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

Commentary: leg-side wide
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Usman Ghani, 1 wide

Commentary: short and wide outside off, Ghani throws his bat at the ball and cracks it away to the left of sweeper cover for four
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Usman Ghani, FOUR runs

Commentary: Shahzad misjudges a short ball that does not rise as much as he expected it to. He ducks into it and cops a blow on the helmet
Commentary_short: Soumya Sarkar to Usman Ghani, no run

Commentary: reverse-swept from the stumps fine of short third man
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 2 runs

Commentary: dragged short and outside off, Shahzad swivels and short-arm pulls it fiercely to long-on
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

Commentary: non-turner on off stump, bunted down to long-on
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: Nazmul Islam brings out his nagin celebration after winning a leg-before appeal from umpire Izatullah Safi. Shahzad is peeved, however. And he has good reason to be peeved: replays detect he had gloved a reverse-sweep onto the thigh pad. He has to go, though. He leaves with a wry smile. Lucky break for Nazmul. For those wondering, no DRS in this series
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Shahzad, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Shahzad lbw b Nazmul Islam 26 (22b 3x4 1x6) SR: 118.18

Commentary: darted on off, defended back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, no run

Commentary: full on middle, goes low, and sweeps to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: full and angling into the pads, duly picked off to fine leg
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: full and straight, shuffles across and clips to deep midwicket for one
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Usman Ghani, 1 run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, stabbed to mid-off off the front foot
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, no run

Commentary: chest-high short ball on middle, cramps the batsman for room, pulled to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: chest-high short ball aimed the ribs, Ghani is through with his hook and lobs it behind off the glove. Mushfiqur completes the catch diving forward. Ghani goes for 19 off 26 balls
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Usman Ghani, OUT
Dismissal_text: Usman Ghani c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Abu Jayed 19 (26b 1x4 1x6) SR: 73.07

Commentary: slower short ball outside off, hoodwinks the batsman
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: short on off stump, pulled away to the right of deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: off-stump yorker, jammed to short midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: rushes the batsman into a hook, spliced to square leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: on a length and outside off, opens the face and dabs a single to point
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: hip-high short on middle, pulled to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: off-stump full-toss, clipped to the leg side
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: Stanikzai forays down the track, takes it on a half-volley, takes it from outside off and clears long-on with a mighty swing
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, SIX runs
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, spinning in, driven with the turn to long-on
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, cracked to sweeper cover off the front foot
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: full and spinning in, off the pad to the keeper
Commentary_short: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samiullah Shinwari, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: full outside off, tapped into the covers
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, no run

Commentary: back of a length and angling in at off stump, opens the face and dabs a single in front of point
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

Commentary: full and angling in to hit the pad from over the wicket as the batsman plays around his front pad. But this is heading down leg
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: good length on middle, hangs back and pushes a single down to long-on
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: short and down leg, the batsman ducks under it, wide
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, 1 wide

Commentary: length ball outside off, right in his swinging arc, Stanikzai holds a stable base and crunches it over long-on for six
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, SIX runs

Commentary: presses forward and drives a slower ball from outside off to point
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Asghar Afghan, no run

Commentary: full and outside off, Shenwari loses his shape, swings across the line and collects fresh air
Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: full and outside off, he holds his shape now and muscles it flat and hard over long-on for six
Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, SIX runs

Commentary: slower short ball outside off, splices a pull to long-on
Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: full-toss outside off, Stanikzai backs away outside leg and seams it over extra cover for six
Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Asghar Afghan, SIX runs

Commentary: on a length and outside off, Stanikzai looks to swing across the line. He ends up skying a catch to Sabbir, the sub, at long-on
Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Asghar Afghan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Asghar Afghan c sub (Sabbir Rahman) b Ariful Haque 27 (17b 0x4 3x6) SR: 158.82

Commentary_short: Ariful Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: short and angling into the body, Nabi does well to ride the bounce and help it down to long leg for a single
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

Commentary: Hider runs in hard, hits the deck harder. Bangs a bouncer outside off, rushes a hook. Finds the top edge but it lands to the right of square leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: good change-up from Hider. Slower offcutter outside off, the batsman is early into a drive and does not make contact in the end
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, no run

Commentary: chest-high short ball on middle, he gets into position early and swivel-pulls to long leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

Commentary: big bouncer outside off, flies through to Mushfiq, called a wide, of course
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 wide

Commentary: good length and angling into the pads, he twirls his wrists and clips it with the angle to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: another slower offcutter outside off, throws his hands at a drive and manages an inside edge onto the pad
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

Commentary: Nabi chips it to the left of mid-off. Good length just a shade outside off, Nabi looks to drive it on the up. He has to check his shot and scoops it up to the left of Mahmudullah who completes a fine diving catch
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Mohammad Nabi, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Nabi c Mahmudullah b Abu Jayed 3 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 60.00

Commentary: pretty full and drifting outside leg, glanced off the pads to fine leg. Given as two leg byes
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, 2 leg byes

Commentary: short and wide outside off, Najib makes additional room and slaps it away to sweeper cover. Crisp timing although it was hit to the fielder
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, 1 run

Commentary: Shenwari leaps off the feet, rides the bounce of this short ball outside off, and secures a single to deep third man
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: short and angling across off stump, pulled away to deep midwicket. Not off the middle, though
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, 1 run

Commentary: dug in short and angling in towards off stump, this is pulled on the bounce to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, stops on the batsman slightly and he uses his wrists to work it away through midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, turning in towards leg stump, defended to midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: fuller and flatter, pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: full on off stump, whipped to midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: fullish, close to off stump, and Najibullah is struggling to get Shakjib away here, driven back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: wider now, outside off, stays back to a fairly fullish length and steers it to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, 1 run

Commentary: Again the ball stops on the pitch. Shortish on leg stump and Najib is too early into his pull. Can't connect, and the ball hits him on the body
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: shortish slower one, angling away from off stump. Najib swings too early, looking to swat it away through midwicket, and fails to connect
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, no run

Commentary: finally he middles one. It's short again, on off stump, and this time he times his swivel perfectly to send the pull soaring over the square leg boundary. A vital, pressure-releasing shot for Najib
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, SIX runs

Commentary: length ball on off stump, and that's lovely, clears his front leg and swings freely through the line to lift it over mid-off
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on leg stump, misses the flick and the ball pops off his thigh into the off side, enabling the batsmen to run a leg-bye
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Najibullah Zadran, 1 leg bye

Commentary: shortish outside off, pulled in the air, one-bounce, to long-on
Commentary_short: Abu Jayed to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle and off, and that's a lovely bit of wristwork from Shenwari to drill it back down the ground, between the bowler and the diving mid-off fielder, to pick up four more
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, FOUR runs

Commentary: short, angling into the batsman's body as he looks to step across and pull. Too early into the shot and the ball hits him on the right side of his chest and rolls into the point region
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 leg bye

Commentary: was that the slower one? Looked like it. Back of a length, fairly wide outside off, and Najib, reaching out to slap it, only manages an inside-edge that rolls slowly behind the wicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Najibullah Zadran, 1 run

Commentary: short, angling into off stump, and that's carted away. Steps across with his back leg to open up his hips and allow him to hoick it away flat and hard over the square leg boundary
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, SIX runs

Commentary: shortish on off stump, flat-batted down the ground towards long-off
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: full, on the stumps, clipped away to long-on
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Najibullah Zadran, 1 run

Commentary: and Shakib gets his man. Full and fairly flat on off stump, and he couldn't get as much power behind the lofted drive as he wanted, hits it straight to the man at long-on
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Najibullah Zadran, OUT
Dismissal_text: Najibullah Zadran c Mahmudullah b Shakib Al Hasan 15 (16b 1x4 1x6) SR: 93.75

Commentary: that's excellent work from the man at long-off. Mahmudullah, I think. Shafiq wanted to clear his front leg and launch this off-stump ball over long-on, but it dipped and turned and skewed off the outside half of the bat to the left of long-off. Mahmudullah sprinted hard to his left, caught the ball by the boundary, realised he was falling over it, and tipped the ball behind him to save the boundary
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Shafiqullah, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, chopped to backward point
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Shafiqullah, 1 run

Commentary: a touch slower, on off stump, goes back and works this through midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs

Commentary: full outside off, drilled to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up a bit slower, Shafiqullah brings in a lot of bottom hand to whip this to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Shafiqullah, 1 run

Commentary: floated up just outside off and Shafiq misses the sweep. Doesn't miss off stump by much.
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Shafiqullah, no run

Commentary: dangled up wider outside off and Shafiq can't make clean contact. Had to reach for it to hit it over the covers, and it dipped and turned and skewed off the outer half of his bat, loops up for a simple catch at backward point
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Shafiqullah, OUT
Dismissal_text: Shafiqullah c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Nazmul Islam 4 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 80.00

Commentary: goes for the reverse-sweep. Fired in flat on leg stump - he must have seen the batsman wind up early - and the shot is hit hard and flat but straight to backward point
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: fullish on middle stump, swiped away to long-on
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Rashid Khan, 1 run

Commentary: makes room to hit over extra-cover and he closes down his angle with a full one from wide of the crease. Drilled straight back to the bowler, on the bounce
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

Commentary: full on off stump and the innings ends with an inside-out drive for a single to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Nazmul Islam to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump, driven down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: looks to deny him room and overdoes it, floats a full one down the leg side
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

Commentary: back of a length, angling into off stump. Looks to punch down the ground, but the ball doesn't turn as expected, goes with the angle instead and rolls into the square leg region off the inner half of the bat
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: beaten. Liton pushes at this flighted one outside off with just his hands, no real footwork, and the ball turns in less than expected and beats the outside edge
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: down the track now, heaves across the line and misses. Big lbw appeal but the ball struck him outside the line of off stump
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: stays back this time and flicks too early, leading edge pops up and loops over midwicket
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: short of a length outside off, punched to cover
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: back of a length, angling into middle stump, tucked away to midwicket
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: the ball stops on Liton again, a short one outside off. Looks to pull and sends the top edge ballooning over Nabi, who's running towards the boundary from mid-on. Reaches out but the ball just eludes his fingertips
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: sees the batsman take a step down the track and fires it into his body, angling down leg. Clears his front leg and slogs, but he can't connect and the ball hits him on the thigh
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: finally middles one. Shortish again, on off stump, and he uses his wrists for a front-foot whip-pull over midwicket
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: sees Liton looking to make room and follows him with a short ball. Pulled to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: length ball slanting across to off stump, opens his bat face to dab to backward point
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: tossed up offbreak turning from middle to leg, swept away to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: down the track comes Tamim and that's a confidence-boosting shot. Skips away from the line of this middle-stump ball to enable a full, free swing of the bat to hit it flat and clean, back over the bowler
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: flatter now, angling into the stumps, whipped to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: down the track again, and this time he's popped a catch straight to extra-cover. Saw him coming, saw him making a bit of room, and bowled it wider outside off and a touch slower. Reached out to try and chip it over extra-cover, but only managed to hit it straight to the man
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c sub (Darwish Rasooli) b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 5 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 83.33

Commentary: flighted ball outside off, driven to cover point
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: down the track and he spots him and bowls it shorter, angling into the pads. Clipped to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: flat, back of a length, turning into leg stump. Tucked away gently to the left of short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: flat, angling into off stump  from round the wicket. Not short enough to pull, ends up dragging it gently into the midwicket region off the bottom half of the bat
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: looks to sweep and misses
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: down the track now, makes a lot of room to drive through the off side but can't beat extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length ball angling into off stump. Lets it come on and steers into the point region
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: not short enough or wide enough to cut, ends up chopping it off the bottom edge towards short third man
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: shortish, angling into off stump, pulled to the right of deep square leg. A fumble from Najibullah allows an easy second run
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

Commentary: down the track now and what's happened there? Didn't pick the googly, looked to whip it over midwicket, and ended up sending an edge flying to the left of slip, who dived but couldn't get his hand to it
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: down the track again and he fires it into the batsman's legs. Looks to flick and misses and the ball slides on to hit pad
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: shot! That is sensational from Soumya, a switch-hit. Switches hands and feet in a flash to slap this flat off-stump offbreak over the third man boundary. He hit it with the spin and right off the middle of the bat
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: fired in full at the batsman's feet and he misses the flick. Appeal for lbw but that was surely sliding down leg
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: shorter now, on the pads, nurdled away to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: ooh, falls just short! Length ball angling into off stump and Soumya isn't on the front foot to flick this. Plays it from the crease and only manages a thick outside edge
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: gone, Bangladesh have lost their second! Liton swept this to the left of short fine leg and called for a single before realising the ball was too close to the fielder and sending his partner back. By then it was too late for Soumya - who was nowhere near getting back home when the bowler picked up the throw and flicked it underarm onto the stumps at his end
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar run out (Karim Janat/Mohammad Nabi) 15 (13b 1x4 1x6) SR: 115.38

Commentary: length ball on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: full, just outside off, gets nicely forward to the pitch of the ball and flicks it with the turn through square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

Commentary: back of a length, turning towards leg stump, and that's another run-out! What is happening here! Tucks this to short fine leg and again the non-striker, Liton, goes haring out of his crease. Why! The fielder, Aftab Alam, doesn't have much ground to cover. Picks it up and throws to Nabi, and he has the simplest of tasks left to flick off the bails at his end. Bangladesh are committing suicide here
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Liton Das run out (Aftab Alam/Mohammad Nabi) 12 (14b 1x4 0x6) SR: 85.71

Commentary: shortish outside off, Mushfiqur goes back to cut but can't connect. Still early in his innings and he isn't quite in tune with the pace of this pitch
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: back of a length and Shakib misses the flick. Loud appeal from the bowler for lbw but that pitched outside leg stump.
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: slower bouncer wide of off stump. Too wide, decides the umpire
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: short, a bit of width, and Mushfiqur loves it there. Rolls his wrists over at the top of the bounce to cut it away to the left of backward point
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: full, angling into off stump, Mushfiqur plays a checked drive to extra-cover
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: looks for the wide yorker, ends up slipping it too wide of off stump. Mushfiqur has no choice but to leave it
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

Commentary: length ball angling into off stump, opens his bat face and jabs it to the right of point
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full on middle and off, pushes it to mid-off, who's on the edge of the circle, allowing the batsmen to hurry through for a quick single
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, angling in towards off stump. Opens his bat face to guide this to backward point
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: full, angling into off stump, driven firmly but too close to extra-cover, who stops it, falling to his left, but lets it roll away from him to allow the single
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length outside off, steered down to third man
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: down the track now, steps away from the line as Aftab angles it in full, and drives it hard to mid-off
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside off, gets on the front foot and slaps it to backward point. Rolls his wrists over too early - looked like the slower ball, and fails to get the intended power
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: sees him stepping out and making room, shortens his length while angling it into leg stump. Flat-bats it to extra-cover
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: Shot! Bowled this fullish, angling into leg stump, and Shakib just whipped it away with Jayasuriya-esque wrists and easily cleared the backward square leg boundary
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

Commentary: down the track and he tries to cramp him by angling it into his leg stump. Jabs towards cover and sets off before turning back, and it was a good decision to turn back. Direct hit at the keeper's end, but he was just about back in his crease
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: what a catch that is, Samiullah Shenwari! Full now, angling into off stump from wide of the crease, and Shakib drives it cleanly, flat, inside-out, and would have got four runs for it another day. Today, however, Shenwari flies to his right at extra-cover and is parallel to the ground as he plucks this catch one-handed. Outstanding
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Shakib Al Hasan c Samiullah Shinwari b Karim Janat 10 (9b 0x4 1x6) SR: 111.11

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: shortish on off stump, lets it come on and guides it down to third man
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: full, angling into Mahmudullah's toes. Clipped away to long leg
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, punched down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away to the left of backward square leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up on off stump, gets on the front foot and uses his wrists to clip it down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, dabs it with soft hands to backward point and calls his partner through for a single
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, defended to midwicket
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: length ball turning in towards off stump, defended back towards the bowler. Nabi's got these last two balls to turn and bounce quite sharply
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: flat, angling into the pads, tickled away nicely to the right of short fine leg
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 3 runs

Commentary: back of a length, skids on towards middle and leg. Pushed into the on side, looking for one, but the bowler moves quickly to his right to stop it
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, stabbed towards backward point
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: ooh, extra bounce. Looks for the lat-cut and the ball jumps up, hits the outside edge, and flies away wide of slip
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: back of a length on the pads, clipped away through midwicket
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: picks the googly, but doesn't quite execute the sweep right. Looks to sweep from off stump, and it hits the bottom edge and jams down into the pitch
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: full, angling down leg, and Mahmudullah puts it away gleefully, leaning over it and bringing his wrists into play for the old-fashioned leg glance. The man at long leg is too square to even try to stop it
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on off stump, punched to backward point
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: shortish, not enough width for the late dab to third man. A bit of extra bounce too and the ball beats his outside edge
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: length ball, a little wider outside off. Looks like the slower one, and Mahmudullah doesn't have any pace to work with as he tries to dab it to third man. Only manages to send it rolling a few feet to the right of the keeper
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: full on middle stump, clipped down to long-on
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer outside off and Mushfiqur can't connect as he tries to ramp it over the keeper
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: shortish outside off, punched to extra-cover
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: back of a length, angling into leg stump, clipped into the mid-on region for one. Long-on was back so the bowler gave chase himself
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: fast legbreak on middle stump. Looked to flick initially, but stopped himself from closing the face right at the last moment to play it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: length ball on leg stump, pushed back cautiously towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: fullish on off stump, clipped away through midwicket
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length on leg stump, punched to long-on
Commentary_short: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, turning into middle stump, makes room and punches to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: sees him looking to make room and darts it in full on middle and leg. Stabs it down to backward point for one. Seemed like a comfortable single at first, but Mushfiqur was a little slow getting to the bowler's end, and a direct hit at that end brought the third umpire into play
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: flat, quick and short of a length on the pads. Is caught between pulling and flicking, and in the end he hurriedly squeezes it down to short fine leg
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: finally puts one away. Gets down on his knee almost premeditatedly, and hoicks another fastish, stump-bound offbreak over the square leg boundary
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, SIX runs

Commentary: back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room and jabs it away to the left of sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: quick length ball on off stump, stays on the back foot and blocks it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: bangs it in hard and it rises shoulder-high over off stump. Top-edges his pull but it lands safely short of the man at long leg
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: angles this into the pads, flicked to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: another bouncer, angling into the batsman now. Misses the hook and the ball bounces short of Shahzad, falling to his left. Rolls down to fine leg, who's stationed nice and fine to stop it from running away for four byes
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 bye

Commentary: full on off stump, driven off the back foot to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: off-stump yorker, squeezed away to the left of extra-cover for a quick single
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: slower short ball wide of off stump. Mahmudullah inside-edges the back-foot slap, and the ball rolls down to the left of Shahzad
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: length ball angling down leg. Looks to get down on one knee and swipe it leg-side, but can't connect. Hits his back thigh and rolls into the backward point region
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs
Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: tossed up fuller on off stump, swept along the ground to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: quickish and flat on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: googly, pitches wide enough outside off - and short enough - to telegraph to the batsman where it's going, and he stabs it to backward point
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length close to off stump, dabbed gently to backward point
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye
Aftab Alam to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

Commentary: short ball angling well down leg. Misses the pull. Theatrical appeal from Shahzad. Definitely no glove. Not out, but no wide signal either. Hmmm.
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: full on leg stump, clipped away through midwicket
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: full-toss on off stump, and Mahmudullah puts it away, clears his front leg and whips it away with a lot of bottom hand, high over the square-leg bondary
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, SIX runs

Commentary: short slower one, angling down leg. Mahmudullah gets a bit of glove on the pull, Shahzad misses the diving stop, and fine leg makes a sliding stop at the boundary
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

Commentary: full now, on off stump, mid-off is up, and Mahmudullah lofts it over that fielder and picks up another vital boundary. This is heading to a proper tight finish
Commentary_short: Aftab Alam to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: Mushfiq steps away outside leg, Rashid follows him, looks like a googly, breaks back in with extra bounce. Chopped through cover point
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: skidding through on off or just a shade outside off, Mahmudullah closes the face early and chips a leading edge to short cover. He hares across for a single
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: Mushfiq jumps across off for a sweep, he moves even before Rashid delivers. Struck on the pad but outside the line of off
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: wrong'un, breaks back from a length, chopped through point
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: tossed outside off, draws Mahmudullah forward into a sweep and goes past the bat
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: caps the over with a fizzing wrong'un, breaks in and threatens off stump, Mahmudullah somehow keeps it out. Rashid - you beauty. Just two runs off the over
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: Mushfiqur begins the over with a slashed boundary. Banged in short and wide outside off, the batsman makes additional room and clatters it away over point
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: keeps it short on middle, Mushfiq rocks back, picks the length early, and middles a pull to the midwicket fence. Back-to-back boundaries for Bangladesh. They're catching up
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: really full on middle stump, overpitched, Mushfiq backs away outside leg and creams it straight of mid-off inside the circle
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: four in a row. Scenes in Dehradun! Too full on middle, Jant errs in length again. Mushfiq gets under it and launches it over mid-off. Clean swing of the arms. Bangladesh's players in the dug out are pumped. Mushfiq punches gloves with Mahmudullah
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: Make it five fours in a row. Mushfiqur is on fire. He pulls off a reverse-sweep. Low full-toss on off stump, Mushfiq goes low and reverse-swats it between backward point and short third man. Excellent execution under pressure
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

Commentary: Nope. Janat finally nails a yorker, on middle, squirted back to the bowler. Mushfiqur and Mahmudullah complete a single. Twenty-one runs off the over
Commentary_short: Karim Janat to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

Commentary: Rashid has Mushfiqur holing out to deep square leg. What a gun bowler. Rashid pushes it through full on middle stump, Mushfiqur goes for his favourite slog-sweep but he does not get all of it. He hits it straight into the lap of Najibullah Zadran
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Najibullah Zadran b Rashid Khan 46 (37b 7x4 0x6) SR: 124.32

Commentary: googly? drifting down leg, Mahmudullah tickles a sweep and finds short fine leg
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: wrong'un outside off, Ariful does not pick the variation, goes low and swings for the hills nevertheless. He slog-sweeps and inside-edges it past the stumps, wide of the keeper
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Ariful Haque, 2 runs

Commentary: tossed-up legbreak, spins away outside off, slogs and edges it to short third man
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Ariful Haque, 1 run

Commentary: another wrong'un outside off, Mahmudullah drags a sweep to deep midwicket off the inside half
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: SENSATIONAL effort at the edge of the long-on boundary from Shafiqullah. He was won it for Afghanistan. They whitewash Bangladesh 3-0! Another googly, but the length is shorter and outside off, hoicked away hard and flat to long-on. Will it go over the boundary? Nope. Shafiqullah leaps to his left and attempts to catch the ball. He can't catch it but manages to swat it into the field of play even as the ball swerves away from his reach. Then the ball somehow finds its way to wicketkeeper Shahzad, who breaks the bails, to run out Mahmudullah on the third. The third umpire is called in to see if Shafiqullah had stepped beyond the boundary when he flicked the ball back into the field of play. It is a matter of an inch, but he had not. And if Bangladesh had pilfered the third run, it would have been a tie. Shahzad does the nagin dance now. Go for it, champ. Rashid takes flight in joy. Celebrations in full swing in the Afghanistan camp. Madcap finish in Dehradun
Commentary_short: Rashid Khan to Ariful Haque, 2 runs, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mahmudullah run out (Shafiqullah/Mohammad Nabi/†Mohammad Shahzad) 45 (38b 3x4 2x6) SR: 118.42
